data.comment: The match has started, with Juventus kicking-off.
Federico La Penna signals a Juventus throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
In the minute 2, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Dusan Vlahovic gives Fiorentina a 0-1 lead in Turin.
That's a fine assist from Franck Ribery.
In the minute 4, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 6, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 9, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Turin.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 18, Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) has been sent off!
Attention is being given to Fiorentinaâ€™s Gaetano Castrovilli and play has been suspended briefly.
Fiorentina's Gaetano Castrovilli looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Fiorentina.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Aaron Ramsey with Danilo.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Free kick Juventus.
In the minute 22, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Juventus.
Cristiano Biraghi (Fiorentina) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Matthijs De Ligt (Juventus) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Juventus.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina drive upfield and Borja Valero gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 25, Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
In Turin Fiorentina attack through Borja Valero. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Fiorentina drives forward and Gaetano Castrovilli gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 27, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 28, Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 33, Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Juventus pushes forward through Cristiano Ronaldo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 37, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Fiorentina's Franck Ribery has been booked in Turin.
In the minute 39, Free kick Juventus.
Sofyan Amrabat gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fiorentina.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Federico La Penna awards Juventus a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Turin.
In the minute 45, Free kick in a good position for Juventus!
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 45, Federico Chiesa of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The first-half is over at Allianz Stadium.
The second-half has commenced. Fiorentina with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a second substitution, with Federico Bernardeschi replacing Alvaro Morata.
Matthijs De Ligt of Juventus is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 47, Borja Valero (Fiorentina) has received a yellow card from Federico La Penna.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 51, Juventus drive forward but Leonardo Bonucci is judged offside.
Fiorentina make their first substitution with Erick Pulgar replacing Borja Valero.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 53, Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Juventus's area.
In the minute 57, Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo has run offside.
Important block from the Fiorentina defence as Weston McKennie fires in a strike for Juventus.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Juventus are pushing forward but Danilo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Fiorentina.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 63, Fiorentina's Erick Pulgar breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In Turin Juventus drive forward through Federico Chiesa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 72, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Alex Sandro for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Dusan Vlahovic for Fiorentina is whistled offside.
In the minute 73, Andrea Pirlo is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Stadium with Dejan Kulusevski replacing Weston McKennie.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 75, The away team have replaced Dusan Vlahovic with Christian Kouame. This is the second substitution made today by Claudio Cesare Prandelli.
Sofyan Amrabat (Fiorentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
An unfortunate own goal by Alex Sandro makes the score 0-2.
In the minute 77, Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Turin.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 80, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
It's now 0-3 in Turin as Martin Caceres scores for Fiorentina.
Cristiano Biraghi with an assist there.
In the minute 82, Lorenzo Venuti is replacing Cristiano Biraghi for the away team.
Giacomo Bonaventura is on a sub for Franck Ribery for Fiorentina.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 83, Federico La Penna awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Lorenzo Venuti for Fiorentina has been booked by Federico La Penna and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Juventus's Danilo has been booked in Turin.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 87, Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Matthijs De Ligt, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick Fiorentina.
The home team has substituted Matthijs De Ligt with Gianluca Frabotta. Andrea Pirlo is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 89, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Fiorentina drives forward and Giacomo Bonaventura gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
